|brand = WatchGuard |model = Firebox T40 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -W |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = FS4AE5W |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q6G-FS4AE5W |icid = 4657A-FS4AE5W |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 7016A1827004 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = NXP;LS1043A; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.6 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Innotek;DEM24-16GM41BW1SC; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25U3232FM2I02-TR; |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4A8G085WC-BCTD; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1545; |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:01:21 |oui = 00:01:21
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2018.09; |stockos = Linux;4.14.140;WatchGuard Fireware OS version 12.10.3.B694994;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, mSATA, Mini PCIe |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = at |pwr_poe = 54 |pwr_poe_amp = 1.2 |pwr_conn = DIN (3-pin) |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = PoE, RTC w/ battery, heatsink |addchip = 2-Wire RTC;Seiko;S-35390A;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;TI;MA3232C;;1;,,, 4 Output PCIe Gen 1/2 Synthesizer;Renesas;IDT5V41186;;1;,,, 2.4GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85334-11;;3;,,, 5GHz WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85750-11;;3;,,, 802.3af/at PoE Powered Device 1-port PSE Manager;Microsemi;PD69101;;1;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-816;;1;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;1;,,, Hot Swappable, Dual I2C Isolator;Analog Devices;ADuM1250;;1;,,, 150V, 120A 3 Power-Transistor N-Channel MOSFET;Infineon;BSC520N15NS3;;1;,,, 100V, 60A N-Channel Enhancement Mode MOSFET;Sinopower;SM1A06NSF;;2;,,, 3.8-17V, 12A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS56C215;;1;,,, 4.5-17V, 8A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS658215;;1;,,, Positive High-Voltage Power-Limiting Hotswap Controller;TI;TPS2493;;1;,,, 8-bit Parallel-Out Serial Shift Register;TI;SN74LV164A;;1;, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 10.0.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = readwrite |defaultssid = T40-W-XX:XX:XX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 07/01/2023 |fccapprovdate = 05/15/2020 |estreldate = 06/12/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08B471HNX |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = {{convert |9.37|x|9|x|4.62|in|mm}} |weight = {{convert|3.69|lb|g}}
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :[http://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/help-center/en-US/Content/en-US/Hardware-Guides/firebox-t40-hardware-guide.html Hardware Guide] * [https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/quick_start_guides/Firebox_T40_quickstartguide.pdf Quick Start Guide]
{{See also|Project:Network/Hardware Specific/WatchGuard|WatchGuard}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' LS1043A @1.0GHz :Quad Core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Memory: 4GB (DDR4) SDRAM *Storage: 4MB (SPI) Flash, 16GB (mSATA M.2) SSD *Wi-Fi: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 (802.11an/ac) *Network: 5x GbE ports 1 w/802.3at PoE out *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports *Power: 54V/1.2A via 3-pin DIN
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:WatchGuard Firebox T40-W Top.jpeg|Board Top File:WatchGuard Firebox T40-W Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:WatchGuard Firebox T40-W Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
